body: @WeeBenetar 90% of doujins are misogynistic trash. People don't use this shit for shitty politics. They use it to get off. You must be self projecting as you clearly don't know how to separate fiction from reality. Anyway, this piece is a masterpiece. All of their works should be translated. What a gift to humanity.
I can't believe I came to this misogynistic trash.
